page.title: 17RECREATION BILLINGSHURST
page.content: RECREATION IN BILLINGSHURST IS FAIRLY EXTENSIVE WITH MUCH OF IT IN THE ADJACENT SECTION.IN THIS SECTION MONDAY CLUB FOR 14 TO 18 YEAR OLDS, CENTRE CLUB II TO 13,AND SUNDAY CLUB 4 TO 11 MEET AT THE CHURCH CENTRE.AT THE VILLAGE HALL,THERE IS LADIES BADMINTON 2 MORNINGS/WEEK WITH MIXED SESSIONS ON 2 EVENINGS/WEEK.FOOTBALL IS PLAYED ON THE PARISH COUNCIL GROUND AT MANOR FIELDS AND THE"BEAVERS"JUNIOR FOOTBALL CLUB HAS TEAMS PLAYING AT INGFIELD MANOR,WHERE MODEL AIRCRAFT FLYING ALSO TAKES PLACE.A FOOTPATH SOCIETY MEETS IN THE LIBRARY CAR PARK EVERY 4TH SUNDAY MORNING.THERE IS A PLOT OF ALLOTMENTS ON AN AREA OF LAND KNOWN LOCALLY AS THE BOWLING ALLEY.
